issue.title: Unify Rust Errors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently there are two Error items - one Enum and one Struct. These should be unified under a single ArrowError Enum

comments.body:
